title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Workshop on Designing Effective Instruction Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can optimize the presentation of information in educational materials by applying cognitive load theory.
Learners can explain three visual-auditory integration strategies based on multimedia learning theory.
Learners can apply two principles of personalized instructional design—considering learner experience levels and motivation—in practice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
